title: MD
biography: The Apple A5X is a 32-bit system on a chip (SoC) designed by Apple Inc., part of the Apple silicon series, and manufactured by Samsung. It was introduced with and used only in the third-generation iPad, on March 7, 2012. The A5X is a high-performance variant of the Apple A5. Apple claimed the quad-core PowerVR SGX543MP4 graphics processing unit (GPU) in the A5X is two times faster than the GPU in the A5, as the A5X GPU contains two more cores than the dual-core version GPU in the A5.
aiSummary: Vivek Lal is a stroke research specialist with an H-index of 110 at Neurology (Faculty). Has been published in Journal of the Neurological Sciences, New England Journal of Medicine, Nature food. Based in India.
